scripts.dev:services: concurrently --kill-others --names "ui,api,proxy" --prefix "[{name}]" "npm run dev:ui" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:proxy"
scripts.check:syntax: node --check packages/api/src/index.js && node --check packages/proxy/src/index.js && node --check scripts/dev.mjs
scripts.build:verify: npm run build:ui && npm run check:syntax
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:ui && npm run test:proxy
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build:verify
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:deps
scripts.docs:generate:api:md: rimraf docs/auto/api-md && shx mkdir -p docs/auto/api-md && jsdoc2md "packages/{api,proxy}/src/**/*.{js,mjs,cjs}" > docs/auto/api-md/all.md
scripts.docs:generate: npm run docs:generate:api && npm run docs:generate:api:md && npm run docs:generate:graphql && npm run docs:generate:vue
scripts.demo:build:local: cross-env FREEBOARD_STATIC=1 FREEBOARD_BASE_PATH=/demo/ npm run build --workspace=packages/ui
scripts.demo:build:pages: cross-env FREEBOARD_STATIC=1 FREEBOARD_BASE_PATH=/freeboard/demo/ npm run build --workspace=packages/ui
scripts.site:copy-demo: shx mkdir -p docs/.vitepress/dist/demo && shx cp -r packages/ui/dist/* docs/.vitepress/dist/demo/
scripts.site:local: npm run docs:generate && npm run site:stage && npm run demo:build:local && npm run site:build:local && npm run site:copy-demo
scripts.site:pages: npm run docs:generate && npm run site:stage && npm run demo:build:pages && npm run site:build:pages && npm run site:copy-demo
